org.cloudifysource.domain.statistics
Class StatisticsCalculationFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.domain.statistics.StatisticsCalculationFactory

public class StatisticsCalculationFactory
extends Object

A helper DSL factory method for defining statistics calculations.

Since:
2.1
Author:
itaif
See Also:
org.cloudifysource.dsl.internal.DSLReader#createCompilerConfiguration} for the "Statistics" static import

percentile

public StatisticsCalculation percentile(double percentile)
Reduces metric series to the specified percentile value. Applies for time series or instances series. For example if percentile is 50, will choose the median value.

See Also:
PercentileStatisticsCalculation.createTimeWindowStatistics(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit), PercentileStatisticsCalculation.createInstancesStatistics()

median

public StatisticsCalculation median()
Reduces metric series to the median value. Same as percentile(50) Applies for time series or instances series.

See Also:
PercentileStatisticsCalculation.createTimeWindowStatistics(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit), PercentileStatisticsCalculation.createInstancesStatistics()
